


#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int power2[16] = {1,2,4,8,16,32,64,128,256,512,1024,2048,4096,8192,16384,32768};
main()
{
      int tc,u=1;
      scanf("%d",&tc);
      while(tc--)
      {
      	   printf("Experiment #%d:\n",u++);
           int m,n,q;
           char str[20];
           scanf("%d %d",&m,&n);
           scanf("%s",str);
           int num=0;
           for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
           {
             if(str[i]=='+')
             num = num + power2[m-i-1];
           }
           vector<int> v1;
           v1.push_back(num);
           int a =num;
           if((a&power2[m-1])==power2[m-1])
           {
             if((a&1)==1)
             a=a-1;
             else
             a=a+1;
             a = a<<1;
             //a=a^1;
             a = a&(power2[m]-1);
           }
           else
           {
             a = a<<1;
             a=a^1;
             a = a&(power2[m]-1);
           }
           v1.push_back(a);
           if(a!=num)
           {
               while(1)
               {
                    if((a&power2[m-1])==power2[m-1])
                   {
                     if((a&1)==1)
                     a=a-1;
                     else
                     a=a+1;
                     a = a<<1;
                    // a=a^1;
                     a = a&(power2[m]-1);
                   }
                   else
                   {
                     a = a<<1;
                     a=a^1;
                     a = a&(power2[m]-1);
                   }
                   if(a==num)
                   break;
                   else
                   v1.push_back(a);
               }
           }
           int size = v1.size();
           for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
           {
               scanf("%d",&q);
               int c = q%size;
               int d = v1[c];
               int ans[m],flag=0;
               for(int i=m-1;i>=0;i--)
               {
               	   if(d==1 && flag==0){
               	   ans[i]=d;flag=1;}
          	       else if(d==1 && flag!=0)
         		   {
         		   	  ans[i]=0;
         		   }
                   else if(d!=1)
                   {
                      ans[i]=d%2;
                      d=d/2;
         		   }
               }
               for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
               {
                  if(ans[i]==1)
                  printf("+");
                  else
                  printf("-");
                  
               }
               printf("\n");
           }
      }
      return 0;
}
